job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Python, AWS, SQL
job.description: If you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience please read onbrbrThis is a fulltimepermanent position directhire with my clientbrbrWe are a computer vision company that develops realtime computeraided detection and diagnostic tools for the healthcare industry Recently receiving 15 million in funding we are on track to be one of the fastest growing start ups out of MIT We are looking for a solid Python engineer to come in and help us improve our products right away brbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Developing and maintaining highperformance scalable distributed services for our data pipelinebrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli 4 years of professional experiencelili Pythonlili AWSlili SQLlili PostgreSQLlili Dockerlili JenkinsbrliulSo if you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrChrisCavishCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  CC181642622  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulChris Cavish  Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
